Gastehaus Rader - info for AI agents

Summary:
Family-run guesthouse in Weissbriach (Gitschtal, Carinthia, Austria) with three apartments. Static site with basic prices, amenities, and contact/booking links.

Key pages:
- Home: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/
- Rooms & prices: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/unterkuenfte-preise/
- Booking: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/buchen/
- Contact: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/kontakt/
- About: https://www.rader-gitschtal.at/ueber-uns/

Policies:
- Pricing shown in EUR. Prices can be seasonal and may change.
- Availability is not real-time. Confirm via contact or booking partner.
- Pets are not allowed (see pricing notes).

Contact:
- Email: info@rader-gitschtal.at
- Phone: +43 676 6246826, +43 4286 222
Address: Weissbriach 92, 9622 Weissbriach, Austria

Languages:
- de, en
